name: E-Obot
description:
Help E-Obot escape the research facility in which he is trapped, but beware, his battery is quite old, so he will need to be plugged in most of the time, otherwise he might not make it to the end. As long as he is close to a power source, everything will be fine, but sometimes, one has to take risks to earn their freedom.

This game was made in 48 hours for the GMTK 2021 game jam.

We humbly thank you for playing our game, we hope you enjoyed it and are very open to any criticism if you want to take the time to help us be better game devs!

-The clown gang

How to Play: 

Use the A and D key to move the character left and right. Use spacebar to jump. Press E to connect/disconnect from nearby power sources.

You must reach the room's exit without running out of power in order to win.

Credits:

  • Miguel Santana - programmation, design, UI
  • Émile Jutras - programmation, design, music
  • Raphael Dodier - main character art
  • Frederic Guy - UI
  • Philippe Guy - programmation, design, art
